name: Spoofing / Layering
description: Detects spoofing and layering patterns where an account places multiple orders on one side (which are subsequently cancelled) while executing on the opposite side. Requires a cancellation pattern (MUST_PASS) and evaluates opposite-side execution activity.
query: SELECT cp.product_id, cp.account_id, cp.pattern_date AS business_date, cp.cancel_count, cp.cancel_quantity, cp.pattern_side, cp.window_start, cp.window_end, ta.total_value, ta.buy_value, ta.sell_value, 'equity' AS asset_class FROM calc_cancellation_pattern cp LEFT JOIN calc_large_trading_activity ta ON cp.product_id = ta.product_id AND cp.account_id = ta.account_id WHERE cp.cancel_count >= 3
